edu.rice.pcdp.runtime

Class Runtime

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rice.pcdp.runtime.Runtime

  • public final class Runtime
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BaseTask currentTask()
      Get the current task of the current thread.
      static void popTask()
      Remove the top of the task-tracking stack for the current thread.
      static void pushTask(BaseTask task)
      Track the passed task as the currently executing task for this thread.
      static void resizeWorkerThreads(int numWorkers)
      A method for altering the number of worker threads used by PCDP at runtime.

      Print some basic runtime statistics.

      Run the provided task on the thread pool backing this runtime.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • resizeWorkerThreads

        public static void resizeWorkerThreads(int numWorkers)
                                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        A method for altering the number of worker threads used by PCDP at runtime. It is the programmer's responsibility to ensure that no tasks are executing or pending on the runtime when this call is made.
        Parameters:
        numWorkers - The number of workers to switch to using.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - An error occurs shutting down the existing runtime instance.

      • currentTask

        public static BaseTask currentTask()
        Get the current task of the current thread.
        Returns:
        Currently executing task.

      • pushTask

        public static void pushTask(BaseTask task)
        Track the passed task as the currently executing task for this thread.
        Parameters:
        task - Currently executing task

      • popTask

        public static void popTask()
        Remove the top of the task-tracking stack for the current thread.

      • submitTask

        public static void submitTask(BaseTask task)
        Run the provided task on the thread pool backing this runtime.
        Parameters:
        task - Task to make eligible for execution.

      • showRuntimeStats

        public static void showRuntimeStats()
        Print some basic runtime statistics.
